Articles.Content: I made it to the north pole this morning in a jet...thats about it...
Kewl. Just made it back from the Mun. First time in .15. Looks pretty.
In 0.14.3 I landed on the north and south pole, With the rover mod, I spent about 2 hours real time, driving around on a flat Ice sheet :L

I launched a single-stage rocket into orbit with jet engine assist, vertically. Turns out jets in the Kerbal Space Program are pretty powerful.

It\'s a pretty legitimate and economic method for getting into LKO. Will turn out pretty handy for when space assembly becomes viable with docking.
